stimulusHtml:
For each of the following disturbances, discuss the immediate and long-term effects on ecosystem succession.

  1. A volcano erupts, covering a 10-square-kilometer portion of a mature forest with lava.

  2. A 10- square-kilometer portion of a mature forest is clear-cut.

features.html:
Directions: Answers must be in essay form. Outline form is not acceptable. Labeled diagrams may be used to supplement discussion, but in no case will a diagram alone suffice. It is important that you read each question completely before you begin.

The diagram above shows the succession of communities from annual plants to hardwood trees in a specific area over a period of time.
